= How to use branches of SVN for your ongoing work =

The best practice for working with SVN is to create a fresh new branch for every single task you start, not just sticking to the `branches/yourname` or whatever. 

One can use as many branches as he wants and call them `branches/bbelousov-short-task-name` or `/branches/yourname-issue21`
